text: Blues rock is a type of music which mixes blues with rock and roll, and uses mostly electric guitar as a main instrument. It began in the mid 1960s in England and the United States with bands such as Cream and The Rolling Stones, who experimented with music from the older bluesmen like Elmore James, Robert Johnson, Howlin' Wolf and Bo Diddley. ==Examples of Artists== *Allman Brothers Band *Mike Bloomfield *Joe Bonamassa *Eric Clapton *Fleetwood Mac *Rory Gallagher *Jimi Hendrix *John Mayall *The Rolling Stones *Carlos Santana *Lynyrd Skynyrd *George Thorogood *Status Quo *Stevie Ray Vaughan *Johnny Winter *ZZ Top *David Wilcox ==Sources== Category:Rock music
title: Blues-rock
